components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime
components.name: Physical Optimizer

fields.description:
Even for simple queries which only have a column filter, the PCR does not check if PPR has run before & therefore pulls all partition columns down for queries which do not have a partition filter at all.

fields.summary: PCR: Should not fetch all the Partitions to Client always
